TRADING_SIZE.description: This is how much tokens you will trade per cycle

INTERVAL.description: This is how often your cycles would happen

COIN_TO_CHECK_WALLET.description: If you run out of this the bot won't buy COSS

DONT_TRADE_UNDER.description: if your hodlings of coinToCheckWallet fall under this value the bot doesn't trade

PUBLIC_API_KEY.description: Should be generated in your COSS profile

PRIVATE_API_KEY.description: Should be generated in your COSS profile
